sentences.english: In the US, Tibetan mastiff pups can be bought for as little as several hundred dollars, Feltenstein said.
sentences.chinese: 费尔滕斯坦说，在美国，区区几百美元就能买到藏獒。

sentences.english: Don't you see: Britain and Japan, only three islands, still prosper.
sentences.chinese: 君不见英日区区三岛尚崛起。

sentences.english: Fabio Capello"s England also has just a 4pc chance, it said."
sentences.chinese: 而卡佩罗率领的英格兰队也区区只有4%的夺冠几率。

sentences.english: We can only offer you a beggarly two hundred pounds to start with.
sentences.chinese: 一开始我们只能给你区区二百英镑作为酬金。

sentences.english: The other Chinese knickknacks they found sold for as little as $65.
sentences.chinese: 他们找到的其他中国小物件只卖了区区65美元。

sentences.english: Cool down ; there's no need to lose your temper over such a trivial matter.
sentences.chinese: 冷静些，没有必要为如此区区小事而大动肝火。

sentences.english: Hold a heart, fear not Jun cha.
sentences.chinese: 一心抱区区，惧君不识察。

sentences.english: He was treating the whole thing as a joke.
sentences.chinese: 他把整个事情当作区区小事。

sentences.english: Just 12 bottles were made and the company has already sold out.
sentences.chinese: 该公司酿制的区区12瓶“历史终点”已经抢购一空。

sentences.english: In 1993, there were only 480 calling males left in the entire nation.
sentences.chinese: 1993年，全国仅剩下区区480只打鸣雄性秧鸡。

sentences.english: In the US, Tibetan mastiff pups can be bought for as little as several hundred dollars, Feltenstein said。
sentences.chinese: 费尔滕斯坦说，在美国，区区几百美元就能买到藏獒。

sentences.english: Do you think Lal will care for anything so unimportant?
sentences.chinese: 你认为拉尔会看上如此无足轻重的区区之物吗？

sentences.english: We all believe it no good quarrelling over such trifles.
sentences.chinese: 咱们都以为位这类区区小事口角没有好处。

sentences.english: Don't make a fuss about such trifles.
sentences.chinese: 不要为区区小事而大惊小怪。

sentences.english: We should never underestimate the issue of theme.
sentences.chinese: 千万别小觑了这区区的题材小事。

sentences.english: You need not worry over such a matter.
sentences.chinese: 你无需为区区小事而忧虑。

definition: up to the maximum/upper limit/at most
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
taking everything into account (idiom)/when all is said and done
to give no cause for anxiety/nothing to worry about
were it not for/if not for
